dmca.title: [ABUSE] Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
The Planet Policy Enforcement
Sent: Thursday, February 16, 2006 10:26 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com; infringements@sportsmarketingsurveys.com
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] Infringement]

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Your email is being forwarded on to our Copyright counsel for review, at the
address of copyright@theplanet.com.

- -------- Original Message --------
Subject:         [ABUSE] Infringement
Date:         Thu, 16 Feb 2006 16:24:42 -0000
From:         <infringements@sportsmarketingsurveys.com>
To:         <webmaster@webtelek.com>, <abuse@theplanet.com>



  NOTIFICATION OF INFRINGEMENT

* *

*PLEASE NOTE: THIS COMMUNICATION HAS IMPORTANT LEGAL CONSEQUENCES AND
DEMANDS YOUR IMMEDIATE AND URGENT ATTENTION*



*Re: http://www.webtelek.com/tv.php?first=0#2*



*SMS_58//*



Please quote the above Internal Reference in all communications with us
regarding this issue.



We write on behalf of the International Olympic Committee (?IOC?), which
owns and/or controls all rights in the Games of the XX Olympic Winter Games
in 2006 in Turin, Italy (the ?Games?)[,and the IOC?s various media
rightsholders and licensees around the world].



These rights extend to all aspects of the Games, including all athletic
competitions and other events held at all Olympic venues, including the
Olympic village, the competition sites and the practice venues. The
site(s) at which medal ceremonies take place shall also be considered as an
Olympic venue(s) during the time when the medal ceremonies actually take
place.



It has recently come to our attention that your company is hosting a Web
site *http://www.webtelek.com/tv.php?first=0#2* (the ?Infringing Web site?),
which includes, *live stream of RTR Planet news (olympics featured in sports
roundup) *. The use of this Olympic material by the Infringing Web site,
violates the IOC?s rights in the Games.



We wish to make you aware that:



1)     Olympic Material from the Torino 2006 Olympic Winter Games (i.e.
moving images or audio play by play commentary of Olympic events, including
sporting action, Opening, Closing and medal ceremonies or other activities
that occur at Olympic venues) may not be transmitted or communicated via the
Internet or any other electronic medium



2)     Other than as a hypertext link, during the period of the Olympic
Winter Games, to the Official Olympic websites, you may only use the Olympic
Marks for purely editorial use to illustrate news articles where the Marks
are an integral physical part of a relevant article and placed within the
article. The Olympic Marks must be accurately presented in their entirety.
The Olympic Marks or portions or adaptations thereof must not be used in any
commercial context, for instance adjacent to an advertisement or other marks
including your web site logo, or in association with competitions, games,
subscription services or e-commerce of any kind. The Olympic Marks must not
be used in any manner in your web site layout that could imply to any normal
viewer any official connection between your web site and the Olympic Winter
Games.

Please immediately cease the above-described unauthorized uses of Olympic
material and Olympic Marks and confirm to us in writing, *within the next 24
hours*, that you have done so.



*Please also provide us immediately with contact information (including the
name, address, and phone number) for the person or persons responsible for
posting unauthorized content on the Infringing Web site, including the
person or persons who receive and transmit e-mails from the following
address webmaster@webtelek.com/. /*



Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute an
express or implied waiver of the IOC?s rights or remedies, all of which are
expressly reserved.



Kind regards,



Duncan Billane







cc: *abuse@theplanet.com*








- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
